page.title: 15HOME LIFE IN STOURBRIDGE
page.content: My name is Bryan. I am aged 11. I wake at 07.15. I have breakfast and pack my school equipment.I leave home at 8.15. 09.00{school}starts. We do P.E. Our teacher sets us work (Maths). The {mornings}and{afternoons}in our school seem long because our only break is at lunch time. At lunch time I play cricket. I have lunch at 12.35, lunch ends at 01.30. In the afternoon we do English and complete Maths, then do some topic work on the Domesday Project. Sometimes after school I go to Chawn Park and buy some sweets. Then I go home and watch television. I have tea at 18.00 or 20.00. In the evenings I play against my dad at cricket. At 21.00 I come in and watch television for a while. At around 22.00 I clean my teeth and go to bed. In bed I read some comics until about 22.30. Then I go to sleep.
